channel.title: My first ever(hint: its a sword!)
channel.description:
hey guys just got interested in this last night and though i would give it a try. I know its flat lol it was more for design and yes i know how to make it 3d
[IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/4714/51823863.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/1310/35380208.png[/img]
comments please!

is there an easier way to make into prims then starting over because i would rather make a diff sword then redo it completely

item.title: My first ever(hint: its a sword!)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

andr3wrulz:

thanks for the feedback and i just learned how to use prims i didnt know they existed before o.O lol and im not sure how well that curvy design would have came out any other way

Primitive sword > better then this model.

Your swords will look cooler then this AND be 3d if you use prims. So go use them.

Read full topic

item.title: My first ever(hint: its a sword!)
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

The Design itself is brilliant, But the Masterpeice isn’t so great, Try not to Triangulate everything it makes for a very messy Wireframe, Also Try to use primitives… Im not sure everything thinks Tracing is good. Anyway For concept 9/10, Wireframe 3/10 Overall 6/10. Just try to get off the tri’s and use quads

Read full topic
